scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd apps/backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test:all: cd apps/backend && npm run test && cd ../frontend && npm run test
scripts.lint:all: cd apps/backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.db:migrate: cd apps/backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset: cd apps/backend && npx prisma migrate reset
